result.title: Greedy + Heap problems
result.content: Hi. I've been taking a look at this problem from APIO 2007. I'm not really proficient at these kinds of problems (greedy + heap, possibly applications of dp?). Do any of you guys have nice problems to recommend? As you can see from my rating, I'm not that good yet so don't give me Div 1. D and E problems please...
